Package ohos.global.resource.solidxml

Class TypedAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.resource.solidxml.TypedAttribute

  • public abstract class TypedAttribute
extends Object
    Represents a wrapper class for Attribute and dereferences an XML attribute value.
    Since:
    3
    See Also:
    Attribute

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  TypedAttribute.AttrData
      Defines attribute data, including the name, value, and type of the attribute represented by TypedAttribute.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public abstract int getType​()
        Obtains the type of an XML attribute value. The type can be UNDEFINED_ATTR, BOOLEAN_ATTR, COLOR_ATTR, FLOAT_ATTR, INTEGER_ATTR, STRING_ATTR, LAYOUT_ATTR, MEDIA_ATTR, PATTERN_ATTR, or GRAPHIC_ATTR.
        Returns:
        Returns the type of the XML attribute value.

      • getBooleanValue

        public abstract boolean getBooleanValue​()
                                 throws IOException,
                                        NotExistException,
                                        WrongTypeException
        Obtains a boolean value referenced by the XML attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the boolean value of the XML attribute.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the type of the attribute reference value is not BOOLEAN_ATTR.

      • getColorValue

        public abstract int getColorValue​()
                           throws IOException,
                                  NotExistException,
                                  WrongTypeException
        Obtains the color data represented by an integer value referenced by the XML attribute. The original value of attribute must be in one of the following formats:

        #RRGGBB

        #AARRGGBB

        Returns:
        Returns an integer value representing the color data.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the type of the attribute reference value is not COLOR_ATTR.

      • getFloatValue

        public abstract float getFloatValue​()
                             throws IOException,
                                    NotExistException,
                                    WrongTypeException
        Obtains the float value referenced by the XML attribute.
        Returns:

        Throws:

        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the type of the attribute reference value is not FLOAT_ATTR.

                              throws IOException,
                                     NotExistException,
                                     WrongTypeException

      • getResId

        public abstract int getResId​()
                      throws IOException,
                             NotExistException,
                             WrongTypeException
        Obtains the resource ID represented by an integer value referenced by the XML attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the resource ID identifying the resource of the XML attribute.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the attribute is not a referenced value.

      • getParsedValue

        public abstract String getParsedValue​()
                               throws IOException,
                                      NotExistException,
                                      WrongTypeException
        Obtains a string representing the attribute value referenced by the XML attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the string representing the attribute value.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the attribute is not a supported referenced value.
        Since:
        5

        Returns:

      • getMediaResource

        public abstract Resource getMediaResource​()
                                   throws IOException,
                                          NotExistException,
                                          WrongTypeException
        Obtains the Media attribute represented by the Resource referenced by the XML attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns the media file represented by the Resource.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the obtained Resource is null.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the type of the attribute is not MEDIA_ATTR.
        Since:
        5

      • getPixelValue

        public abstract int getPixelValue​(boolean truncat)
                           throws IOException,
                                  NotExistException,
                                  WrongTypeException
        Obtains the pixel value represented by the float value referenced by the XML attribute.
        Parameters:
        truncat - Specifies whether the returned result is truncated. The value true indicates that the decimal part of the float value is truncated, and false indicates that the float value is rounded off.
        Returns:
        Returns the pixel value represented by the float value.
        Throws:
        NotExistException - Throws this exception if the obtained value is null or another invalid value.
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs.
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the type of the attribute is not FLOAT_ATTR.
        Since:
        5

      • computeTranslateRatio

        public static float computeTranslateRatio​(DeviceCapability devCap)
        Calculates the conversion rate of the float attribute based on the device capability.
        Parameters:
        devCap - Indicates the device capability.
        Returns:
        Returns the conversion rate.
        Since:
        5

      • computePixelValue

        public static int computePixelValue​(String original,
                                    Configuration config,
                                    DeviceCapability devCap,
                                    boolean truncat)
                             throws WrongTypeException
        Calculates the pixel value represented by the float attribute based on the device configuration and capability.
        Parameters:
        original - Indicates the string representation of the float attribute.
        config - Indicates the device configuration.
        devCap - Indicates the device capability.
        truncat - Specifies whether the returned result is truncated. The value true indicates that the decimal part of the float value is truncated, and false indicates that the float value is rounded off.
        Returns:
        Returns the pixel value.
        Throws:
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the input original does not match the float attribute.
        Since:
        5

      • computeFloatValue

        public static float computeFloatValue​(String original,
                                      Configuration config,
                                      DeviceCapability devCap)
                               throws WrongTypeException
        Calculates the float value represented by the float attribute based on the device configuration and capability.
        Parameters:
        original - Indicates the string representation of the float attribute.
        config - Indicates the device configuration.
        devCap - Indicates the device capability.
        Returns:
        Returns the float value.
        Throws:
        WrongTypeException - Throws this exception if the input original does not match the float attribute.
        Since:
        5
